speech: The tuition fee for the B.Sc Nursing program is ₹60,000 INR annually. Additionally, there is a bus fee of ₹10,000 INR, bringing the total to ₹70,000 INR. The fees are divided into three installments: 1st Installment: ₹30,000 (Due at the time of admission), 2nd Installment: ₹20,000 (Due after the first semester), 3rd Installment: ₹20,000 (Due after the second semester).
